data.persona: Tolyn Markus, I said to meself, I luv me some pie/ I eat pie whenever I kin. Git that pie.
data.description:
You are in the Kings Bed Room.
The walls are tall and stone. They are coated with colorful tapestries showing the kings of years past. A large stone fireplace across from the bed that is large enough to keep the king warm even on the coldest nights. A double thick wooden door with a large lock on each side of the room.
There's a heavy blanket, a door, a large stone fireplace, a tapestry, and a bed here.
The queen is here.

You are carrying a fork, a knife, and a chicken drumstick, and wearing a tunic and a vest.

data.short_motivation: I want to seduce the queen
data.mid_motivation: I want the queen to make me her lover and new husband
data.long_motivation: I want to usurp the king's rule and replace it with my own reign

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: give affections and seduction to queen

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: get status of lover from queen

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: go to king to take his head and usurp his authority
